mapper.select: /* selectPosition */ SELECT A.POSITION_SN , A.POSITION_TITLE , A.POSITION_DESC , A.POSITION_REQUIRE , A.RECEIVE_NM_FIRST , A.RECEIVE_MAIL_FIRST , A.RECEIVE_NM_SECOND , A.RECEIVE_MAIL_SECOND , A.DISPLAY_YN , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REG_DT , (SELECT FILE_SN FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POSITION_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_SN_MAIN , (SELECT FILE_USER_NM FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POSITION_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_USER_NM_MAIN , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POSITION_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_PATH_MAIN , A.POSITION_CAT , B.CODE_NM AS POSITION_CAT_NM FROM TB_CAREER_POSITION A INNER JOIN TB_CODE B ON (B.CODE_ID = A.POSITION_CAT) WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.POSITION_SN = #{position_sn}

/* selectPositionList */ SELECT A.POSITION_SN , A.POSITION_TITLE , A.POSITION_DESC , A.POSITION_REQUIRE , (SELECT FILE_USER_NM FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POSITION_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_USER_NM_MAIN , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POSITION_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_PATH_MAIN , B.CODE_NM AS POSITION_CAT_NM FROM TB_CAREER_POSITION A INNER JOIN TB_CODE B ON (B.CODE_ID = A.POSITION_CAT) WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND A.POSITION_ID = #{position_id} ORDER BY A.POSITION_SN DESC

/* selectPositionTitleList */ SELECT A.POSITION_SN , A.POSITION_TITLE FROM TB_CAREER_POSITION A WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND A.POSITION_ID = #{position_id} ORDER BY A.POSITION_SN DESC
